mapper.select:
select PLAN_NO,to_char(DUE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') dueDate,ORD_SHT_NO,WORK_PROT,to_char(PLAN_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') plan_date from pdt_plan where 1=1
and now_phs ='Y'
and now_phs ='N'
and due_date>=#{startDate}
and #{endDate}>=due_date
order by plan_no
select prd_cd , (select prd_nm from adm_prd where prd_cd = prd_cd) as prd_nm , cnt as need_cnt from pdt_ord_view where ORD_SHT_NO=#{ordShtNo}

select distinct a.mtrLot , a.instrNo , a.lineNo , a.prcCd , a.dtlSelect , a.mtrCd , a.hldCnt , a.stckCnt , a.realCnt , b.use_amt from (select a.mtr_lot as mtrLot , a.instr_no as instrNo , a.line_no as lineNo , a.prc_cd as prcCd , a.dtl_select as dtlSelect ,b.mtr_cd as mtrCd , b.hld_cnt as realCnt , 0 as hldCnt ,b.stck_cnt as stckCnt from used_mtr_lot a join mtr_lot_stck b on (a.mtr_lot = b.mtr_lot)) a join adm_bom b on a.mtrCd=b.mtr_cd and a.prcCd = b.prc_cd where a.instrNo = #{planNo} and a.prcCd=#{prcCd}
mapper.insert:
insert into pdt_plan (WORK_PROT,PLAN_NO,DUE_DATE,
ORD_SHT_NO,
PLAN_DATE,now_phs) values ( #{workProt} ,#{planNo} ,to_date(#{dueDate},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') ,
#{ordShtNo},
sysdate,'N')
mapper.select: select a.use_amt as useAmt,a.mtrlot as mtrLot , a.stckCnt as stckCnt , a.hldCnt as hldCnt , a.mtrcd as mtrCd , b.prd_cd as prdCd , (select prd_nm from adm_prd where prd_cd = b.prd_cd) as prd_nm , b.need_cnt*a.use_amt as needCnt from (select a.prc_cd as prcCd,a.use_amt as use_amt,b.mtr_lot as mtrLot ,b.stck_cnt as stckCnt,b.hld_cnt as hldCnt ,b.mtr_cd as mtrCd ,a.prd_cd as prd_cd from adm_bom a join mtr_lot_stck b on (a.mtr_cd = b.mtr_cd) where a.prd_cd=#{prdCd} AND a.prc_cd = #{prcCd}) a join (select prd_cd, cnt as need_cnt from pdt_ord_view where ORD_SHT_NO=#{ordShtNo}) b on(a.prd_cd= b.prd_cd) order by useAmt

select a.prc_cd as prcCd,a.use_amt as useAmt,b.mtr_lot as mtrLot ,b.stck_cnt as stckCnt,(b.stck_cnt-b.hld_cnt) as realCnt,0 as hldCnt ,b.mtr_cd as mtrCd ,a.prd_cd as prdCd from adm_bom a join mtr_lot_stck b on (a.mtr_cd = b.mtr_cd) where a.prd_cd=#{prdCd} AND a.prc_cd = #{prcCd} and b.stck_cnt-b.hld_cnt>0 order by b.mtr_cd
mapper.insert: insert into pdt_plan_dtl (line_no, plan_no,prd_cd, prc_cd, need_cnt, instr_cnt,work_str_date) values( #{lineNo}, #{planNo}, #{prdCd}, #{prcCd}, #{needCnt}, #{instrCnt}, to_date(#{workStrDate},'yyyy-MM-dd')+#{date})
mapper.select: select prd_cd , prd_nm, able_line_no as lineNo from adm_prd where prd_cd=#{prdCd}
mapper.update: update pdt_plan set now_phs = #{nowPhs} where plan_no=#{planNo}
mapper.select: select a.mtr_cd as prdCd , a.safe_stck ,(nvl(a.safe_stck,0) -sum(nvl( b.stck_cnt,0))) needCnt from adm_mtr a left join mtr_lot_stck b on a.mtr_cd = b.mtr_cd where a.mtr_cd like 'PRD%' and a.safe_stck > (nvl(b.stck_cnt,0)-nvl(b.hld_cnt,0)) group by a.mtr_Cd , a.safe_Stck,a.safe_stck order by 1
select prd_cd, prd_cd as prdCd1, prd_nm, prd_std, mng_unit, use_yn, prd_sect, able_line_no from adm_prd
select DISTINCT a.line_no from fct_line a join fct_info b on (a.line_no = b.line_no) where fct_phs='비가동' order by 1
select uph_pdt_amt*24 as upd from fct_line where line_no = #{lineNo}

select distinct b.prc_cd ,b.prc_seq , (select prc_nm from adm_prc_mng where prc_cd = b.prc_cd) prc_nm from (select prd_cd from adm_prd where able_line_no like '%'||#{lineNo}||'%') a join adm_prc_flow b on a.prd_cd = b.prd_cd order by b.prc_seq
